channel.title: phpmyadmin on 馬丁沒有派對
channel.description: Recent content in phpmyadmin on 馬丁沒有派對

item.title: CentOS6.5 安裝phpMyAdmin
item.description: 一、安裝phpMyAdmin phpMyAdmin對應php版本會有影響，請挑選適合的版本 wget http://sourceforge.net/projects/phpmyadmin/files/phpMyAdmin/4.1.12/phpMyAdmin-4.1.12-all-languages.tar.gz tar -zxvf phpMyAdmin-4.1.12-all-languages.tar.gz mv phpMyAdmin-4.1.12-all-languages /usr/share/nginx/html/phpMyAdmin rm phpMyAdmin-4.1.12-all-languages.tar.gz 二、設定config.inc.p
